mapper.select: select OS , VERSION , max(case when env = 'DEV' then file_name ELSE '' end) AS 'DEV_PATH' , max(case when env = 'PREPRED' then file_name ELSE '' end) AS 'PREPRD_PATH' , max(case when env = 'PRD' then file_name ELSE '' end) AS 'PRD_PATH' from app_mykt group by version order by version desc
